channel.title: Settings on ESP Relay
channel.description: Recent content in Settings on ESP Relay

item.title: WIFI Settings
item.description: function getWifiData() { $.ajax({ type: 'GET', url: '/info/wifi', data: { get_param: 'value' }, dataType: 'json', success: function (data) { $("#wifi_avtive").prop('checked', true); $("wifi_ssid").value = data["ssid"]; } }); } $(document).ready(function(){ getWifiData(); }); $(document).ready(function(){ $("#submit").on('click', function(){ $.ajax({ url: 'test.php', type : "POST", dataType : 'json', data : $("#form").serialize(), complete: function () { getWifiData(); } }) }); }); WIFI Active: SSID: Password: Submit

item.title: MQTT Settings
item.description: MQTT Active: Secure Connection: Hostname: Port: Username: Password:
